ComicInfo.Title: Charles Barkley vs. Godzilla Part XVII; One Fine Day in Surgery; Get Smarty; Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles in Japan; Little-Known Insurance Policies; A Few Odd Men; If There Was Truth in Advertising; The Cracked Movie Awards; Gangland Land America's First Urban Decay Theme Park; The Monkey Quotient; History Time Line; Health Care USA an In-Depth Report; Teenage Mutant Ninjerk Turdles III: The Sacred Sequel of Dumbness; 13 Alternatives for Bungee Jumpers
ComicInfo.Summary:
Barkley and Godzilla play another game of basketball. This time Godzilla kills Barkley and takes his shoes.
Surgeons save a man from becoming an angel by plucking out his wings.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 22:42:10. [Issue ID 250642]
